data.title: You truly can't go wrong here, from soups, sandwiches to salads, so good
data.text: We lived here 2 years before trying it and sure wish we hadn't waited.  They have amazing breakfast and what I love the most is the "create my own sandwich" with just what I want on it.  The bread's are amazing and numerous so you can chose whatever you like.  Plus the condiment choices are many as are the potential toppings - it's so very good.  Honestly, we haven't had one bad experience here so couldn't possibly recommend just one item, as all we have tried have been fresh and wonderful.
